title.narrative: Strategic Investment in Sustainable Peace and Democratisation in the Horn of Africa

description.narrative: The overall objective of the pilot project is to contribute to the promotion of peace, democracy and development through building the capacity of youth in the Horn of Africa countries of Sudan, South Sudan and Ethiopia.

title.narrative: Number of National Youth Level Coalitions established and provided with the capacity to deliver a national programme of youth led activities

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

target.value: Estabish regional policy forum for Horn of Africa to represent the voice of youth

comment.narrative: Estabish regional policy forum for Horn of Africa to represent the voice of youth

actual.value: National coalitions actively discuss a HoA Coalition but a clear and final vision and structure remains to be developed
